Title: Gazprom plans to expand annual pipeline gas supplies to China to 48 Bcm
Description: Russia’s state-owned Gazprom said that it plans to expand pipeline natural gas supplies to China in 2027 with the commissioning of the Far Eastern pipeline route.
Author: JS

Title: Sanctioned Everest Energy LNG tanker arrives at Murmansk transshipment terminal
Description: Everest Energy, one of the LNG ships which covertly loaded cargo from Russia’s sanctioned 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG 2 project on the Gydan Peninsula, has arrived at the Murmansk LNG transshipment terminal and might be readying for a ship-to-ship LNG transfer as the cargo continues its search for buyers.
Author: JS
